title: Exxon Takes Long View on Venezuela, CEO Says
description: Exxon Mobil Corp. Darren Woods says the company is taking a long-term view on Venezuela after meeting with President Donald Trump at the White House. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Exxon Mobil Corp. Darren Woods says the company is taking a long-term view on Venezuela after meeting with President Donald Trump at the White House. (Source: Bloomberg)
